metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20480 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In NotificationChannel of NotificationChannel.java, there is a possiblefailure to persist permissions settings due to resource exhaustion. Thiscould lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-241764350

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
